targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  avg(ava_debt)  as 'debt'
FROM HourlySource
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start) and ava_debt > 0

SELECT
  avg(exp_debt)  as 'debt'
FROM HourlySource
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start) and exp_debt > 0

SELECT
  avg(lat_debt)  as 'debt'
FROM HourlySource
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start) and lat_debt > 0

SELECT
  source, 
  avg(ava_debt) as 'debt'
FROM HourlySource
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start) and ava_debt > 0 
group by source
order by debt desc
limit 5

SELECT
  source, 
  avg(exp_debt) as 'debt'
FROM HourlySource
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start) and exp_debt > 0 
group by source
order by debt desc
limit 5

SELECT
  source, 
  avg(lat_debt) as 'debt'
FROM HourlySource
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start) and lat_debt > 0 
group by source
order by debt desc
limit 5

SELECT
  start AS "time",
  avg(nullif(ava_debt, 0)) as 'availability debt',
  avg(nullif(exp_debt, 0)) as 'experience debt'
FROM HourlySource
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start) 
group by start

SELECT
  start AS "time",
  avg(nullif(lat_debt,0)) as 'latency debt'
FROM HourlySource
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start) 
group by start
ORDER BY start

SELECT
  start AS "time",
  sum(total) as 'request',
  sum(ava) as 'No 5XX',
  sum(exp) as 'No 4XX'
FROM HourlySource
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start)
group by start
ORDER BY start

SELECT
  start AS "time",
  avg(lat) as 'latency ms'
  
FROM HourlySource
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start)
group by start
ORDER BY start

SELECT
  source, 
  avg(ava_debt) as 'debt'
FROM HourlySource
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start) and ava_debt > 0 
group by source

SELECT
  source, 
  avg(exp_debt) as 'debt'
FROM HourlySource
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start) and exp_debt > 0 
group by source

SELECT
  source, 
  avg(lat_debt) as 'debt'
FROM HourlySource
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start) and lat_debt > 0 
group by source

SELECT
  start AS "time",
  ava_debt
FROM HourlySource
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start) and ava_debt > 0 
ORDER BY start

SELECT
  start AS "time",
  exp_debt
FROM HourlySource
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start) and exp_debt > 0 
ORDER BY start

SELECT
  start AS "time",
  lat_debt
FROM HourlySource
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start) and lat_debt > 0 
ORDER BY start

SELECT  source, 
        max(avaSlo) as 'ava slo',
        ifnull(AVG(NULLIF(ava_debt ,0)),0) as 'ava debt',
        max(expSlo) as 'exp slo',
        ifnull(AVG(NULLIF(exp_debt ,0)),0) as 'exp debt',
        max(latSlo) as 'lat slo',
        ifnull(AVG(NULLIF(lat_debt ,0)),0) as 'lat debt'
FROM HourlySource
WHERE
$__timeFilter(start) 
Group by source
